text: James Martin Michael Hanifan (September 21, 1933 â€“ November 24, 2020) was an American football coach. He was the head coach for the St. Louis Cardinals of the National Football League (NFL) from 1980 to 1985. In 1955, he played for the Toronto Argonauts. Hanifan was born in Compton, California. Hanifan died on November 24, 2020 in St. Louis, Missouri at the age of 87.Former Cardinals coach Jim Hanifan dies at 87 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Compton, California Category:Sportspeople from California Category:Sportspeople from St. Louis, Missouri Category:American football coaches Category:American football players Category:Toronto Argonauts players
title: Jim Hanifan
